description: Returns a list of monitors created with the  CreateMonitor operation and  CreateAutoPredictor operation. For each monitor resource, this operation returns of a summary of its properties, including its Amazon Resource Name (ARN). You can retrieve a complete set of properties of a monitor resource by specify the monitor's ARN in the  DescribeMonitor operation.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: An array of filters. For each filter, provide a condition and a match statement. The condition is either IS or IS_NOT, which specifies whether to include or exclude the resources that match the statement from the list. The match statement consists of a key and a value. Condition - The condition to apply. Valid values are IS and IS_NOT. Key - The name of the parameter to filter on. The only valid value is Status. Value - The value to match. For example, to list all monitors who's status is ACTIVE, you would specify: "Filters": [ { "Condition": "IS", "Key": "Status", "Value": "ACTIVE" } ] (dict) --- Describes a filter for choosing a subset of objects. Each filter consists of a condition and a match statement. The condition is either IS or IS_NOT, which specifies whether to include or exclude the objects that match the statement, respectively. The name of the parameter to filter on. The value to match. The condition to apply. To include the objects that match the statement, specify IS. To exclude matching objects, specify IS_NOT.

nested_items.name: Monitors
nested_items.description: An array of objects that summarize each monitor's properties.

nested_items.name: MonitorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the monitor resource.

nested_items.name: MonitorName
nested_items.description: The name of the monitor resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the predictor being monitored.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the monitor. States include:

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When the monitor resource was created.

nested_items.name: LastModificationTime
nested_items.description: The last time the monitor resource was modified. The timestamp depends on the status of the job:
ACTIVE or CREATE_FAILED - When the monitor creation finished or failed.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Forecast returns this token. To retrieve the next set of results, use the token in the next request.
